DESCRIPTION:
You can display your collection with the command "sc"
- Your collection can be sorted by Name, Cosmetics, Stats and more
- It can also be filtered by "Wishlist", "Gen" or "Tag" Name
- Use the command "sc t:ut" to display all untagged cards in your collection
SLASH_DESC: Select a user in order to see their collection
SLASH_DESC2: Enter the filters you want to apply to the collection
NO_CARDS_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any cards matching your search
NO_TAG_FOUND: You don't have any `Tags` yet. You can create them with the command `stc <name> <emoji>`
